name: Secure
description: The Secure branch gives options for immediate and brief protection in response to enemy attacks.

name: Contain
description: The Contain branch gives options for using defensive magic to neutralize threats for a short  time.

name: Protect
description: The Protect branch gives options for defending a location or group over a longer period of time.

name: Gale
description: The Gale branch provides options for dealing damage to single and multiple targets

name: Gust
description: The Gust branch provides options for battlefield control, pushing and pulling entities with wind and providing speed and mobility.

name: Breeze
description: The Breeze branch provides options for utility spells.

name: Dueling
description: The Dueling branch gives options for attacks with the bow, focusing on medium range attacks with minor utility.

name: Casting
description: The Casting branch gives options for various air magic spells, with a focus on dealing damage to single and multiple targets.

name: Buffing
description: The Buffing branch gives options for air aspected buff spells, which are largely offensive in nature.

name: Bolster
description: The Bolster branch gives options for improving the offensive capabilities of items and entities.

name: Fortify
description: The Fortify branch gives options for improve the defensive capabilities of items and entities.

name: Supplement
description: The Supplement branch gives options for providing additional utility options to items and entities.

name: Geyser
description: The Geyser branch provides options for dealing damage to single and multiple targets as well as minor forced movement.

name: Harbor
description: The Harbor branch provides options for defense as well as battlefield control.

name: Confluence
description: The Confluence branch provides options for healing, cleansing, and buffing.

name: Zapping
description: The Zapping branch provides options for dealing damage to single targets.

name: Blasting
description: The Blasting branch provides options for dealing damage to multiple targets.

name: Arcane
description: The Arcane branch provides options for additional utility, usually related to damage dealing.

name: Skulk
description: The Skulk branch provides options for gap closing on targets and finding alternative angles of attack

name: Preparation
description: The Preparation branch provides options for temporarily increasing your offensive capabilities and augmenting your attacks.

name: Execution
description: The Execution branch provides options for delivering the killing blow.

name: Aggressive
description: The Aggressive branch provides options for organisms that will fight by your side, specializing in dealing damage and harrying the opponent, or protecting you and your allies.

name: Steadfast
description: The Steadfast branch provides options for organisms with various types of defensive and utility functions.

name: Research
description: The Research branch provides options for interacting with your organisms that have already been deployed.

name: Ephemeral
description: The Ephemeral branch gives options for conjuration spells meant to last seconds, for immediate emergency use cases.

name: Formed
description: The Formed branch gives options for conjuration spells meant to last at least 1 minute, for use during brief encounters or to solve short problems.

name: Lasting
description: The Lasting branch gives options for conjuration spells meant to last at least 1 hour, for long term use by large groups.

name: Subjugate
description: The Subjugate branch gives options for controlling a single target crowd control and charms.

name: Dominate
description: The Dominate branch gives options for controlling a large group with crowd control and charms.

name: Tyranny
description: The Tyranny branch gives options for control-based utility spells.

name: Arctic
description: The Arctic branch provides options for damage, both single target and multi-target.

name: Chilling
description: The Chilling branch provides options for crowd control, primarily in the form of slows and freezes.

name: Snow
description: The Snow branch provides options for utility and defense.

name: Sway
description: The Sway branch provides options for charming and confusing enemies.

name: Strut
description: The Strut branch provides options for utility and restoring your allies.

name: Shimmy
description: The Shimmy branch provides options for evasion and gaining resistances.

name: Dueling
description: The Dueling branch gives options for attack with the greatsword, focusing on aggressive, heavy attacks.

name: Casting
description: The Casting branch gives options for various dark magic spells, with a focus on dealing damage and applying conditions.

name: Buffing
description: The Buffing branch gives options for dark aspected buff spells, which are largely offensive in nature.

name: Sunder
description: The Sunder branch gives options for dealing physical damage with blunt weapons to single targets in melee range.

name: Raze
description: The Raze branch gives options for dealing physical damage with blunt weapons to multiple targets at short ranges.

name: Teardown
description: The Teardown branch gives options for destroying buildings and terrain, and other utility abilities.

name: Shock
description: The Shock branch provides options for dealing damage to single targets.

name: Electrify
description: The Electrify branch provides options for dealing damage to multiple targets.

name: Thunder
description: The Thunder branch provides options for additional utility spells.

name: Personal
description: The Personal branch gives options for enchanting effects onto weapons and armor, mostly useful for combat purposes.

name: Structural
description: The Structural branch gives options for enchanting large, immotile objects like walls and floors, mostly useful for exploration or defense.

name: Minutiae
description: The Minutiae branch gives options for enchanting smaller motile or handheld items, mostly useful for utility.

name: Haywire
description: The Haywire branch gives options for constructs that are aggressive in combat, dealing damage and inflicting conditions.

name: Processor
description: The Processor branch gives options for constructs that assist with defensive tactics and resource management.

name: Maintenance
description: The Maintenance branch gives options for adjusting constructs on the battlefield.

name: Dueling
description: The Dueling branch gives options for attacks with the rapier, focusing on quick lunges, parries, and strikes.

name: Casting
description: The Casting branch gives options for various lightning magic spells, with a focus on dealing damage to single and multiple targets.

name: Buffing
description: The Buffing branch gives options for lightning aspected buff spells, which are largely offensive in nature.

name: Luminosity
description: The Luminosity branch gives options for dealing damage to one or multiple enemies.

name: Radiance
description: The Radiance branch gives options for healing spells.

name: Gleam
description: The Gleam branch gives options for buff, defense, and utility spells.

name: Devastation
description: The Devastation branch provides options for inflicting direct dark magic damage to one or multiple targets.

name: Affliction
description: The Affliction branch provides options for inflicting various conditions to hinder enemies.

name: Obfuscation
description: The Obfuscation branch provides options for utility spells.

name: Migraine
description: The Migraine branch provides options for dealing psychic damage to one or multiple targets.

name: Mentalism
description: The Mentalism branch provides options for offensive psychic attacks that do not focus on damage.

name: Memory
description: The Memory branch provides options for defensive psionics.

name: Incineration
description: The Incineration branch gives options for dealing fire magic damage to single targets.

name: Conflagration
description: The Conflagration branch gives options for dealing fire magic damage to multiple targets.

name: Wildfire
description: The Wildfire branch gives options for additional fire magic based utility spells.

name: Operation
description: The Operation branch provides options for dealing damage, with each ability providing both a primary and secondary fire option.

name: Assembly
description: The Assembly branch provides options for aiming and setting up for later turns, to maximize action economy and damage.

name: Maintenance
description: The Maintenance branch provides options for reloading and managing misfire chance, as well as other utilities.

name: Dauntless
description: The Dauntless branch provides options for dealing damage with your bladed shields to single or multiple targets in melee range or at a distance.

name: Stalwart
description: The Stalwart branch provides options for defending yourself and others in ways that covers up weaknesses that the typical defensive suite might be used to.

name: Tenacious
description: The Tenacious branch provides options for mobility, utility, and crowd control, using the chains affixed to your shields.

name: Shooting
description: The Shooting branch provides options for dealing damage at far ranges, both single and multi-target.

name: Aiming
description: The Aiming branch provides options for preparing for an attack, with several self-buffs and attack empowering abilities.

name: Improvising
description: The Improvising branch provides options for utility, such as dodges, mobility, and crowd control.

name: Skirmish
description: The Skirmish branch gives options for going on the offensive without over-committing and exploiting new tactical opportunities.

name: Safeguard
description: The Safeguard branch gives options for reliably blocking incoming attacks and protecting allies.

name: Sprint
description: The Sprint branch gives options for dodging attacks and staying mobile while on the front lines.

name: Pack
description: The Pack branch gives options for summons that can deal damage and inflict conditions.

name: Herd
description: The Herd branch gives options for summons that defend the caster and provide additional support in combat.

name: Flock
description: The Flock branch gives options for summons that provide additional utility, including to your other summons.

name: Fiery Soul
description: The Fiery Soul branch gives options for offensive buffs.

name: Stone Body
description: The Stone Body branch gives options for defensive buffs.

name: Fluid Mind
description: The Fluid Mind branch gives options for utility buffs and utility spells to exploit and manipulate buffs.

name: Close Range
description: The Close Range branch gives options for attacking with a melee weapon of your choice.

name: Long Range
description: The Long Range branch gives options for attacking with a ranged weapon of your choice.

name: Weapon Swap
description: The Weapon Swap branch gives options for improved versions of the Weapon Swap Minor Action, granting additional bonuses and flexibility.

name: Assault
description: The Assault branch provides options for single and multi-target damage dealing at melee ranges.

name: Protect
description: The Protect branch provides options for increasing one's defensive stats and blocking attacks.

name: Warcry
description: The Warcry branch provides options for buffs and conditions to be applied to allies and enemies that can hear you.

name: Type A Weapons
description: The Type A Weapons branch gives options for fighting with Strength scaling weapons: axes, blunts, longblades, polearms, shields, and heavy throwing weapons.

name: Type B Weapons
description: The Type B Weapons branch gives options for fighting with Dexterity scaling weapons: bows, bullets, crossbows, fine weapons, light throwing weapons, and unarmed/fist type weapons.

name: Type C Weapons
description: The Type C Weapons branch gives options for fighting with non-scaling weapons: shortblades and improvised weapons. It also provides the most utility of the three branches.

name: Finesse
description: The Finesse branch gives options for attacks with a shortblade that enable a mage to kite enemies and land spells safely.

name: Acumen
description: The Acumen branch gives options for spell attacks that enable a rogue to look for openings and close in on targets.

name: Guile
description: The Guile branch gives options for various roguish utility spells.

name: Descent
description: The Descent branch gives options for summoning dragons to assist in and out of combat.

name: Derivation
description: The Derivation branch gives options for destruction spells that emulate the power of a dragon.

name: Dignify
description: The Dignify branch gives options for spells that emulate the various biological advantages of a dragon.

name: Knighthood
description: The Knighthood branch gives options for golems adapted to the arts of physical warfare.

name: Cadre
description: The Cadre branch gives options for golems who've learned to cast spells and use magic.

name: Retrain
description: The Retrain branch gives options for manipulating existing golems for maximized efficiency and utility.

name: Butchery
description: The Butchery branch gives options for dealing damage to single or multiple enemies.

name: Bloodshed
description: The Bloodshed branch gives options for surviving in the front lines against multiple enemies.

name: Gore
description: The Gore branch gives options to further make use of health as a resource.

name: Ray
description: The Ray branch gives options for single-target and line AOE spells that deal light and ice magic damage to one or multiple targets.

name: Refraction
description: The Refraction branch gives options for creating mirrors to allow the caster to bend shots around barriers.

name: Reflection
description: The Reflection branch gives options for defensive spells themed around the use of mirrors.

name: Generate
description: The Generate branch gives options for developing the base form of the specialized endless construct.

name: Attachment
description: The Attachment branch gives options for powerful augmentations designed to jumpstart the construct's development

name: Extension
description: The Extension branch gives options for helping maintain the general health and longevity of the specialized construct.

name: Decapitate
description: The Decapitate branch gives options for melee attacks with your scythe, powered by mana.

name: Dread
description: The Dread branch gives options for dark spells to deal damage and prevent enemy escape.

name: Doomsday
description: The Doomsday branch gives options for applying powerful unique curses and conditions.

name: Predator
description: The Predator branch gives options for attacks with daggers.

name: Pilfer
description: The Pilfer branch gives options for stealing objects and magical effects during combat.

name: Prowl
description: The Prowl branch gives options for stealth and mobility.

name: Mutualism
description: The Mutualism branch gives options for combining your crafted creatures in order to augment each other both in and out of combat.

name: Parasitism
description: The Parasitism branch gives options for augmenting or attacking other entities with small parasitic organisms that apply special effects.

name: Experimentation
description: The Experimentation branch gives options for additional utility to manipulate your Augmentation and Organics alchemy products.

name: Stabbing
description: The Stabbing branch gives options for executing enemies who have been debilitated by crowd control spells.

name: Translocations
description: The Translocations branch gives options for short range, silent teleports in order to gap close on enemies.

name: Hexes
description: The Hexes branch gives options for applying crowd control to enemies to set them up for the kill.

name: Slayer
description: The Slayer branch provides options for dealing physical damage at range that can punch past demonic defenses.

name: Exorcism
description: The Exorcism branch provides options for light and lightning aspected spells to turn the tables on hordes of demons.

name: Humanity
description: The Humanity branch provides options for further defense and utility.

name: Gelidus Ouranos
description: The Gelidus Ouranos branch provides options for powerful AOE spells with both ice and dark magic

name: Nivis Obscurans
description: The Nivis Obscurans branch provides options for applying powerful and unique curses and conditions to your enemies

name: Magia Ensis
description: The Magia Ensis branch provides options for exploiting your passive.
